# 1000 Python Programs - Complete Index

Organized by category with proper program names for individual GitHub issues.

---

---

## How to Use This Index

1. Pick a program number from the table
2. Create file at: `exercises/1000_programs/<category>/<file_name>`
3. Add docstring with program number and description
4. Test with multiple inputs
5. Submit PR referencing the program number
